column6: Behind the X-Men's worst nightmare there's a bigger nightmare waiting in the wings.  Hecatomb has dropped from deep space onto the island of Providence, bringing death to whatever he touches - and Cable receives an offer of help from a truly terrifying source!
column8: | penciller (cover):Chris Bachalo | writer:Mike Carey | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Tim Townsend
